hero.title: Secure Your Supply Chain with Confidence
hero.subtitle: Enterprise-grade supply chain risk management and vendor security assessment platform
hero.description: VendorSoluce helps organizations identify, assess, and mitigate supply chain security risks through automated SBOM analysis, vendor assessments, and NIST-aligned compliance frameworks.

stakeholders.title: Designed for Every Supply Chain Stakeholder
stakeholders.description: VendorSoluce addresses the unique challenges faced by different teams in your organization, providing tailored solutions that deliver measurable value to each stakeholder.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Supply Chain Security?
cta.description: Join organizations worldwide who trust VendorSoluce to secure their supply chains and meet compliance requirements.

security.title: Security Teams
security.description: Comprehensive tools for identifying, assessing, and mitigating supply chain security risks.

challenges.visibility: Limited visibility into supplier security practices
challenges.tracking: Difficulty tracking vulnerabilities across software components
challenges.compliance: Complex compliance requirements like NIST SP 800-161

sbom.title: Automated SBOM Analysis
sbom.description: Instantly analyze software components for vulnerabilities and license compliance.

assessments.title: Vendor Security Assessments
assessments.description: Send CMMC and NIST Privacy Framework assessments through secure vendor portal.

procurement.title: Procurement Teams
procurement.description: Streamline vendor selection and management with risk-based decision making tools.

challenges.balancing: Balancing cost, quality, and security in vendor selection
challenges.lifecycle: Managing vendor relationships throughout their lifecycle
challenges.contracts: Ensuring contract terms include appropriate security clauses
challenges.diligence: Demonstrating due diligence for audit purposes

calculator.title: Vendor Risk Calculator
calculator.description: Calculate preliminary risk scores to inform vendor selection decisions.

benefits.scoring: Immediate risk scoring for new vendors

dashboard.title: Vendor Risk Dashboard
dashboard.description: Monitor and manage your vendor portfolio with centralized risk visibility.

compliance.title: Compliance Officers
compliance.description: Ensure adherence to regulatory requirements with built-in compliance frameworks.

challenges.evolving: Keeping up with evolving regulatory requirements

nist.title: NIST SP 800-161 Assessment
nist.description: Comprehensive supply chain risk assessment aligned with federal standards.

templates.title: Compliance Templates
templates.description: Access pre-built templates for common compliance scenarios.

executives.title: Executive Leadership
executives.description: Strategic insights and reporting to make informed decisions about supply chain risks.

dashboards.title: Executive Dashboards
dashboards.description: High-level insights into your organization's supply chain risk posture.

reporting.title: Risk Reporting
reporting.description: Generate executive-level reports for board meetings and stakeholder updates.
